legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5001_1001_0:
Hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I knew
you’d come!

I mean, why wouldn’t you? No Trainer would pass
up the chance to encounter a Legendary Pokémon!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5001_0301_0: We’re definitely going to find it!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5001_0401_0: That’s the spirit! I’m looking forward to it!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5001_0302_0: I can’t wait to see it in person!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5001_0402_0: Me too! We’ve got to find it!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5001_1001_0: Huh? What’s with the heavy sigh, Silver?

Oh, that’s right! You two still haven’t been
introduced!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5001_1001_1:
He’s a friend of mine from my adventure across
the Johto region!

Hey, don’t go spouting nonsense! I’m not your
friend. You and I are...
Huh? What’re you getting all quiet for?

Well, that’s Silver for you. He has his moody
moments, but he’s not a bad guy! I’m sure you
two will get along great!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5001_0401_1: So, Silver, what was that sigh about?
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5001_0402_2: Another heavy sigh? What’s wrong, Silver?
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5001_1001_2:
I’m just...dumbfounded. You’re like a Psyduck with
Cloud Nine, the way you always have your head
in the clouds.

We’re talking about a Legendary Pokémon that
can soar through the sky to go wherever it wants.
Do you understand what that means?

How exactly are we supposed to search for it
when it could literally be anywhere?!

Not only that, but even though it’s an artificial
island, Pasio is still pretty enormous.

If you had stopped to think for even a second...
you would’ve realized that we’ll never find Ho-Oh
if we just wander around aimlessly looking for it.
Hmm... Well, when you put it like that...
Hmph. Finally you’re starting to see reason.
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5001_1001_3:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], I know Ethan forced
you to come along. Let’s just go our separate
ways for now.
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5001_0301_3: I won’t give up that easily!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5001_0401_3:
Even so, we can’t do much searching if we don’t
have a plan, now can we?
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5001_0302_3: Let’s come up with a plan to find it!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5001_0402_3:
How are we supposed to do that? If it were that
easy to find a Legendary Pokémon, we wouldn’t
be in this mess.
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5001_1001_3: I’ve got it! I know just who we can ask about this!

I just remembered! There are these girls who know
a lot about Ho-Oh!

I’ve gotta find one of them right away! You two
should come along, too!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5001_1001_4: Hmph. Does he really think this plan will work?
Fine... I guess I’ll come along.

But if Ethan’s wrong about this, I’m never gonna
let him live it down!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5002_1001_0:
I’m telling you, I know what I saw! It flew right
over our heads!

I saw it clear as day with my own eyes!
It was Ho-Oh!

I never would’ve thought that Legendary Pokémon
could be on Pasio...

This is our lucky break! Chances like this don’t just
drop into your lap every day, y’know!

Listen up! I want every member of Team Break
assembled and ready to catch Ho-Oh! That
Legendary Pokémon is as good as ours!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5003_1001_0: Hmm. Should be around here somewhere...

Ethan! Would you mind telling us just who you’re
looking for already?

Those girls from Johto who know all about
Legendary Pokémon! Don’t tell me you forgot
about them, Silver.

They did a dance for Ho-Oh and everything,
remember? All we gotta do is find one of the
Kimono Girls!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5003_0401_0:
It’s not important... Just something that happened
in Johto a long time ago.
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5003_0302_0:
You really think one of the
Kimono Girls would be on Pasio?
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5003_0402_0:
Maybe! Whoever I heard earlier sure talked like
she was from Johto. She’s gotta know something!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5003_1001_1: And the quality of this fabric is beyond compare.

The way it furls about in the wind, I can’t imagine
a more fitting garment for you, Lance.
Thanks. I’m glad to hear that you like it.
But really, what’s not to like about capes?

Huh?! The Kimono Girl isn’t alone. What are you
doing here, Lance?

Oh, if it isn’t [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Are these friends of yours?
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5003_1001_2:
That’s right! We have a question for you,
Kimono Girl!
I see... You saw Ho-Oh on Pasio.
That’s why you went looking for me.

I’m sorry to disappoint you, but I’m not one of the
Kimono Girls. I’m a fashion designer.

Hehe. No need to worry. I actually know quite
a bit about Ho-Oh.

I was so captivated by its dazzling beauty that
I simply had to learn all I could.

Really?! Then my hunch that you’d know all about
Ho-Oh was right on the money!

This sounds like it could be interesting.
Count me in, too.
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5003_1001_3:
Don’t worry about me. I can hear you talk just
fine from here.

Lance, Silver, do you two have some sort of
history together?

Oh, they’re fine! There’s no hard feelings between
them or anything like that.

More importantly, let’s get to the part where you
tell us about Ho-Oh!

As I’m sure you’ve heard, Ho-Oh is a beautiful
Pokémon that possesses magnificent,
seven-colored wings.

It’s said to leave a rainbow in its wake as
it flies.

It creates a rainbow just by flying... Now that’s
a fitting story for a Legendary Pokémon if I’ve
ever heard one.

There are stories about Dragonair being able to
change the weather, but transforming the sky?
That seems even more incredible to me.
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5003_1001_4:
Ho-Oh is also said to live at the foot of
a rainbow.

*sigh*
Ho-Oh is such a captivating Pokémon, isn’t it?

I’d like to design clothes that are as dazzling
as its rainbow-colored wings someday.

Ah, do forgive me. I was so captivated, I lost
myself in thought for a moment.

Wow! There’s all kinds of legends about it! I feel
like I learned a lot just now!

We really wanna meet Ho-Oh. Do you have any
idea where it could show up?
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5003_1001_5:
As I recall, the legends say Ho-Oh has appeared
in Ecruteak City at the Bell Tower and the burned
remains of the Brass Tower.

Perhaps it prefers elevated locales? It does fly
through the sky, after all.

Elevated locales... What’s the closest thing to a
tower here on Pasio? A mountain maybe?

Of course! We just have to climb a mountain and
see what we can find!

Thanks, Valerie! You taught me a whole lot
just now!

Ah, before you go, there is one more thing I just
remembered. It’s actually rather important.
Ho-Oh will not reveal itself to just anyone.

It’s said to only appear before Trainers who are
pure of heart.
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5003_1001_6: A Trainer who’s pure of heart...

Ho-Oh will not appear before any Trainer whose
intentions are wicked.

We’re not the kind of Trainers who’d do anything
bad. We just wanna meet Ho-Oh.

OK, then! [Name:PlayerNickname ], Silver!
We’re going mountain climbing tomorrow!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5003_0301_6: We better wake up bright and early!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5003_0401_6:
That’s right! We’ve gotta search every nook and
cranny of that mountain! We can’t leave a single
stone unturned!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5003_0402_6:
Haha! Don’t worry, I’m bringing my trusty camping
gear. You could come empty-handed and we’d be
totally covered!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5003_1001_6: Don’t keep us waiting, either, Silver!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5003_1001_7: Actually...I think I’ll sit this one out.

I don’t really care about Ho-Oh. I’ve just been
along for the ride this whole time.
You two can go without me.

H-hold on, Silver! What’s gotten into you all
of a sudden?

We’ll be waiting for you tomorrow at the base of
the mountain, Silver! Don’t forget!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5004_1001_0:
Hmph... What’s the point? It’s not like it’s going to
appear before me anyway.

And even if I did go...what if my presence
keeps Ho-Oh away from the area altogether?
*sigh*
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5005_1001_0:
What do you want? I’m not in the mood for a
battle right now.

That’s not why I’m here. I just want to talk.
That’s all.

It’s been a while since you and I have had a
chance to talk like this.

When we first met, the only thing you cared about
was obtaining strong Pokémon that could lead you
to victory.

The thought of loving or trusting your Pokémon
never once occurred to you.
That’s why you lost to me.

Tsk! If you only came here to rub salt in old
wounds, I’m leaving.
I can tell by looking at your Sneasel.
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5005_1001_1: That Pokémon has formed a deep bond with you.

Pokémon are happiest when they’re with the
person they care about the most.
For it to trust you this much...

It can only mean that your adventures in Johto and
your time with Ethan have changed you, Silver.

You keep talking like that, people might
think you’ve retired the cape to become
a Pokémon Professor.
You’re no longer the person you once were.
You think it’s that easy for people to change?

I’m a Trainer who’s done some pretty terrible
things. I stole someone’s Pokémon, and I treated
people like garbage if they got on my nerves.
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5005_1001_2: And worst of all, my dad is...
Even so, I believe in you.
That’s why you should believe in yourself, too.

Your friends [Name:PlayerNickname ] and
Ethan will be waiting for you.

They’re rivals, not friends!
And that goes for you, too!

I haven’t forgotten what it felt like when you
completely destroyed me in battle.
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5005_1001_3:
I’m going to get stronger here on Pasio! I’m going
to become the greatest Trainer in the world!

And when I do, I’m coming for you! You’d better
be ready!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5006_1001_0:
Silver is rather late. I wonder if he’s actually
going to come.
Don’t say that! Silver’s definitely gonna show up!

When we were traveling all over Johto, he’d show
up wherever I was...
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5006_1001_3:
and more often than not, I’d show up wherever
he was.
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5006_1001_0: We’re rivals! That’s why I know he’ll come today!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5006_0301_0: You really believe in him, huh?
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5006_0401_0:
Yup! We’ve had our ups and downs along the
way, but he’s a good guy!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5006_0402_0:
Thanks for believing in Silver, too,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5006_1001_0:
Well said. When you put it like that, I suppose
we should wait a little longer.
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5006_1001_1:
Yeah. Thanks. I’m glad you came along,
too, Valerie.
But won’t it be hard for you to climb in that outfit?
I appreciate your concern, but I’ll be fine.

It just means I’ll need to work even harder if I
want to see Ho-Oh.
Hmph! What’re you so happy about?
My goal is to be the greatest Trainer in the world.

If Ho-Oh does decide to show up...maybe I’ll just
make it my partner by force!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5006_1001_2:
I’m not just gonna stand around and watch while
one of you idiots gets to join up with Ho-Oh.

Hehe! You’re gonna try to make Ho-Oh your
partner now, Silver? Sounds like you’re pretty
fired up!

But if you think I’m gonna lose, think again!
I’m gonna find it first—
That’s the same cry I heard yesterday...

That can only mean Ho-Oh really is somewhere
on this mountain!
It’s on! Time to see which of us finds Ho-Oh first!
Hehe. I suppose I shall give it my all, too.

Hmph! How can they be so casual about this?
Don’t they realize they’re going up against a
Legendary Pokémon?
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5006_1001_3: If they find it first, I’ll be pretty upset...

Let’s go, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! We’re going
to be the first ones to find Ho-Oh, not them!
Looks like they’re after the same thing we are.

But that darling Ho-Oh will be mine! All mine!
Surely it was fate that led me here to meet it!

Call for backup! I want those little pests gone!
Then that lovely Ho-Oh will have no choice but
to be mine!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5007_1001_0:
We’ve been climbing for what feels like forever
and haven’t seen so much as Ho-Oh’s shadow.

But I’ve heard its cry a few more times since we
started, so we must be getting closer.
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5007_0301_0: Let’s keep looking. Don’t give up!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5007_0401_0:
Of course. I still have to prove that I’m the
greater Trainer.
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5007_0402_0:
Not a chance. I know Ethan. If he found it already,
he would’ve told us by now.

That’s the kind of guy he is. Believe me, I’ve spent
more time with Ethan than I’d care to admit.
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5007_1001_0: you kinda remind me of him.
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5007_0401_1:
Yeah. Not in terms of appearance or personality.
It’s more...your eyes.
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5007_1001_1:
They’re always looking off to the distance, giving
off this kinda...gleam. It used to really annoy me
whenever I saw eyes like yours.

But...now I don’t really get that way around
you or Ethan.

The old me definitely would’ve just challenged you
to a battle and not thought twice about it.
What was that? It sounded close!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5007_1001_2:
Does that mean I’m...? No, it’s because you’re
here. Right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Gah! It doesn’t matter! That’s not important now!

Ho-Oh! Now that you’ve finally revealed yourself,
I’m going to make you my partner Pokémon!

You want to see how strong I am? Then let the
battle begin!

Tsk! Who’d be calling me now? This better
be important...
Huh? Ethan? Actually, this is perfect.
Hey, Ethan! Guess what we just fou—
Silver! You’ve gotta get over here!

A bunch of Team Break goons are attacking
Trainers up here on the mountain!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5007_1001_3:
I’m trying to find a safe place for us to hide
right now, but those jerks are probably right
on our tails!

Valerie and I can probably hold out for a little
while, but...you gotta come help us! Hurry!

Drat! We need to go help Ethan,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...

If I pass up this chance, I might never get a
second one...
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5008_1001_0: You got this, Cyndaquil! Just a little more...

Hehe. Wasn’t someone supposed to come to your
rescue? Just give up already.

Tracking down Ho-Oh is our top priority, and if
we happen to find some Pokémon to steal while
we’re at it, who are we to say no?
Where did that Pokémon come from?!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5008_1001_1:
It’s about time you showed up! I knew you’d
come, though...

I bet you thought you were so clever, ganging up
on them to get the upper hand.
If there’s one thing I hate more than anything...
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5009_1001_0: Just don’t get in my way, Ethan!
Those two really are in perfect sync, aren’t they?
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5009_0301_0:
Ethan and Silver sync up so
well together!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5009_0401_0:
Hehe! That’s ’cause Silver would always show up
outta nowhere to challenge me, so I’ve gotten real
familiar with his battle style!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5009_0302_0: Wow, Silver! You’re a natural leader!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5009_0402_0:
Of course I am! Who do you think you’re
talking to?
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5009_1001_0:
Looks like we just turned the tables on you, Team
Break! What’re you gonna do now?
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5009_1001_1:
I...I guess we have no choice...
We surrender...
PSYCH! You think I’m gonna give up now?! As if!
Hehe... Looks like the gang’s all here.
Tch! Quite a crowd she’s brought.

Ahahaha! And there’s plenty more where that
came from! I did come all this way to catch
Ho-Oh, after all!

You can’t possibly win against our superior
numbers! Now, bow before our might!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5009_1001_2:
Relying on superior numbers to win a fight just
reveals how weak and pathetic you really are.

I believe in the power of the Pokémon I’ve
trained! Even if I stand alone against a sea of
opponents, I’ll fight to the very end!

That’s the way I battle! Because I’m going to be
the greatest Trainer in the world!

Hehe, you’re not alone, though. We’ve got
your back!
I’ve still got some fight in me.
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5009_1001_3: Hmph! Just don’t get in my way!

Grrrrr! Are you quite finished putting on the too-
cool-for-school act?!
I’m done playing around with you! Get them!

Omigosh, omigosh! It’s here, it’s here, IT’S HERE!
My sweet little Ho-Oh!

Change of plans, everyone! Catch that adorable
Ho-Oh for me!
Yeow! Hot hot hot hot HOT!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5009_1001_4:
N-now hold on a second! Just what do you think
you’re doing?!

Hot hot HOT! Stop! I’m gonna be cooked to
well-done at this rate!

What is the matter with you?! Do you have any
idea how much trouble I’ve gone through to make
you my Pokémon?!

You may be beautiful, but you’re a bit too
savage for my taste! Retreat! Retreat!
It would seem Ho-Oh came to our rescue.

Yeah. And it doesn’t seem like it’s in a hurry to
leave, either.

Do you think this means Ho-Oh wants to be
a partner Pokémon?

Heh. I was waiting to make my debut, but there’s
no way I can upstage a grand entrance like that.

It’s said that Ho-Oh will reveal itself before a
purehearted Trainer by shining its bright,
rainbow-colored wings...
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5009_1001_5:
I wonder which of you this Pokémon will choose to
be its partner...
Ho-Oh is so beautiful, isn’t it?

If it were my partner Pokémon, I’d spend every
waking hour of every day captivated by it.
I’d fly all over Pasio on its back!

What’s wrong, Silver? What’re you doing
over there?
I don’t want to see Ho-Oh become your partner.
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5009_1001_6:
We both know Ho-Oh prefers Trainers who are
pure of heart...

It’d be one thing if I could make it my partner
by proving my strength. But as long as this is
Ho-Oh’s decision, I’ve got no chance.
I’m just...not that kind of Trainer.
That’s not true at all. Come here.
Shut up! I said I’m fine!

Hmhm... It would seem Ho-Oh has made
its choice...
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5009_1001_7: and it has chosen you, Silver.

Silver, [Name:PlayerNickname ] told me what
you did.

You turned down a chance to battle Ho-Oh
to come help us.

If you hadn’t done that, we would’ve been
done for.

That’s why I know you’re a purehearted
Trainer, Silver.

And that’s also why you should be Ho-Oh’s
partner... You’re suited for each other.
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5009_0302_8: C’mon! Ho-Oh is waiting for you!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5009_1001_8:
Hmph. You’re all too sentimental for your own
good. We’re talking about a Legendary Pokémon,
after all.

Listen up, Ho-Oh! My goal is to become the
greatest Trainer in the entire world!

I don’t care if you’re a Legendary Pokémon! If you
get in my way, I’ll leave you behind! Got it?!

Heh. Looks like you’re just as determined as I am.
Good. I like that.

Together, we’ll be the strongest sync pair in
the world!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5301_1001_0:
Where did it go? I could have sworn it was
this way...

Man, this is annoying. Why couldn’t I have stayed
at the villa?

Ooh! That’s Ho-Oh! A Legendary Pokémon from
the Johto region!

This is great! If the young master had that for a 
partner Pokémon, he’d get even stronger...
Ah! Hey! Wait! I said wait, dang it!
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5302_1001_0: Whoa! Is that what I think it is?
legend_event_pm0250_00_houou/5303_1001_0:
You must be that kid Ethan mentioned.
[Name:PlayerNickname ], or whatever.

Ethan and I were in the middle of a battle when
the Legendary Pokémon Ho-Oh flew overhead.

He decided to cut our battle short so he could
go off and look for it!

You’re friends with Ethan, right? Then come
with me.
That fool is definitely in over his head.
